item.title: Better dmesg in five minutes
item.description: I last wrote about dmesg in 2016. It has mostly not changed since then, but I’ve changed my setup slightly. Here’s a short article about what I did so that you can do it too, and so that I can remember for the next time. Previously: Previous I had a bash alias which looked like this: alias dmesg='dmesg --follow || dmesg' since some machines didn’t yet support the --follow flag.
